definition: (in the spring) nature takes on a new look (idiom)

sentences.english: Photo taken at Buddha Park, also known as Wat Xieng Khuan 25 km southeast from Vientiane.
sentences.chinese: 在佛公园摄，也寺昆万象25公里东南众所周知的。

sentences.english: I love to watch everything come to life in spring.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢看到春天万象更新。

sentences.english: Colorful ribbons are embellishing this world of variety.
sentences.chinese: 绚丽的彩带，点缀世界万象色彩。

sentences.english: From now on all the and beauty, vientiane update.
sentences.chinese: 从此人间一切和美，万象更新。

sentences.english: Dunhuang Grottoes is a history showing with image, including abundant subjects.
sentences.chinese: 敦煌石窟壁画艺术包罗万象，是一部形象的历史。

sentences.english: The report is authoritative, but this is not a comprehensive text.
sentences.chinese: 这份报告具有权威性，但文字并没有包罗万象。

sentences.english: Huishi's knowledge was all-inclusive. His works were fairly many.
sentences.chinese: 惠施的知识包罗万象，他的著作也极可观。

sentences.english: Spring is a time of renewal.
sentences.chinese: 春天是万象更新的季节。

sentences.english: Often think of my mission, Yan sad sympathetic, Vientiane, including Benjamin.
sentences.chinese: 每每想到自己的使命，就悲欣交感，万象悯含。

sentences.english: It has 2.0 Mega-pixel camera, and support Bluetooth.
sentences.chinese: 它有200万象素的摄像头，还支持蓝牙功能。

sentences.english: By the word of the LORD were the heavens made; and all the host of them by the breath of his mouth.
sentences.chinese: 诸天藉耶和华的命而造，万象藉他口中的气而成。

sentences.english: Vientiane, the capital of laos, nestles on the banks of the mekong river .
sentences.chinese: 老挝的首都万象就座落在湄公河岸上。

sentences.english: The universe contains everything that exists, from the tiniest subatomic particles to galactic superclusters.
sentences.chinese: 宇宙包罗万象，小至次原子粒子，大到银河超星系团。

sentences.english: The all-embracing social welfare system facilitates people in their advanced age.
sentences.chinese: 包罗万象的社会福利系统给老人们提供了许多方便。

sentences.english: With the beginning of the new year, everything takes on a new look.
Only true emptiness will not perish.
sentences.chinese: 森罗万象终归坏，唯有真空才不灭。

definition: yin and yang/heaven and earth/the universe
Wuji county in Shijiazhuang 石家莊地區|石家庄地区[Shi2 jia1 zhuang1 di4 qu1], Hebei/The Promise (name of film by Chen Kaige)
